title: Mussler Chiropractic | Registration is open for Herbal Medicine Making!
cleaned_text: Registration is open for Herbal Medicine Making! Our own Board-certified Naturopath Dr. Danni is now taking registrations for Herbal Medicine Making. This course takes place at ETI Technical College, 2076 Youngstown Warren Rd., Niles, Ohio 44406 on Thursday evenings from June 7 to June 28. The cost to take this course is a $55 donation to the Phoenix House Building Fund. Space is limited to 25 participants, so register right away! Students who take the course will learn: - How to make your own herbal remedies to fill your home medicine chest -Which herbs to include in your herbal medicine chest -How to appropriately and safely use these remedies Use of herbals is a natural method that often benefits people with conditions as wide-ranging as fibromyalgia, autoimmune disorders, infections, diabetes, and more. We love to help people feel better through natural methods and these courses help us toward that goal. To register, call 330-758-9567 or visit our [events page](events.html). Stay tuned for these upcoming courses: Holistic Diagnosing September 13 - November 15 Nutrition
